sentences.sContent: You can't gyrate your hips, bend over backwards, dip your partner, or do any other fancy (and calorie burning) dance moves if you can't control your core muscles.
sentences.sContent_eng: You can't gyrate your hips, bend over backwards, dip your partner, or do any other fancy (and calorie burning) dance moves if you can't control your core muscles.
sentences.sCn: 如果你不能控制好你的核心肌肉，你就不能扭动臀部、向后弯曲、转动你的搭档，或者做其他一些有奇特的花样（燃烧卡路里）。

trans.tranOther: to turn around fast in circles
